title: A Gangsta's Pledge 3
description: Sometimes what you think is your lowest moment in life is actually your new beginning... NyAsia Miller and Kwame “Saint” Harris have had anything but an easy life this past year. Nobody said it would be easy loving a gangsta, but Nya is left feeling the full meaning of how hard it can be when she wakes up and Saint is nowhere to be found. Can love conquer all in a life filled with money, sex and retribution? Follow the couple on the next installment in A Gangsta’s Pledge 3.
author: E.L. Griffin
